name: ToyBox Dream
description:
"A childhood dream."

A small Marble Madness/Neverball-inspired level I made for a Unity Game Design exam for my academy. I decided to base it on a dreamy toy box full of different games. For now it's just a small level, but who knows... maybe it will become something more in the future.

Criticism and bug-reports are very appreciated!

Hope you enjoy this dream :)
